crewAssignments.title: Crew Assignments
crewAssignments.noTasksRun: No tasks performed yet this turn.
crewAssignments.noAvailable: No crew members are available for tasks.
crewAssignments.tasksFinalized: Tasks for this turn have been resolved.
crewAssignments.extraTaskUsed: You have already used a story point for an extra task this turn.
crewAssignments.noSPForTask: Not enough Story Points for an extra task.

jobBoard.title: Job Board
jobBoard.noOffers: No job offers available. Advance the turn to refresh.
jobBoard.blacklisted: You have been blacklisted from Patron jobs on this world.

worldInfo.title: Current World
worldInfo.licenseNeededTooltip: A Freelancer License is required to accept Patron jobs on this world.
worldInfo.forgeDescription: Select a crew member to attempt the forgery. This can only be attempted once per world. A roll of 6+ on 1D6+Savvy is required. A natural 1 on the roll will attract unwanted attention.
worldInfo.forgeryAttempted: A forgery has already been attempted on this world.
worldInfo.interdictionWarning: Interdiction in effect. You must leave this system in {turns} turn(s) or obtain an extension.
worldInfo.interdictionEnforced: Interdiction enforced! You must leave this system this turn.
worldInfo.licenseAttempted: You have already petitioned the local authorities.

invasion.title: INVASION!
invasion.description: This world is being invaded! You must attempt to flee or be forced into an Invasion Battle. An 8+ on 2D6 is required to escape.

rivalAttack.title: Rival Attack!
rivalAttack.description: {rivalName} has tracked you down! You must confront them now.

actions.finalizeTasksFirst: You must finalize your crew's tasks for the turn before taking on a mission or advancing.
actions.insufficientFuelDetailed: Not enough credits for fuel. Total cost: {total}cr (Requires {credits}cr + {fuel} from fuel credits).
actions.emergencyTakeoff: Warning: The ship is damaged! An emergency take-off is risky and will cause further hull damage (3D6).
actions.redZoneRequirements: Requires: Turn > 10, Crew >= 7, 15 Credits for license.
actions.sellGearForFuelTooltip: Only available when you lack sufficient credits for fuel to travel.

tradeModal.instruction_book_prompt: Select a crew member to receive +1 XP:
tradeModal.item_choice_prompt: Choose one of the following items:
tradeModal.ordnance_prompt: Select up to 3 grenades. You have selected {count}/{total}.
tradeModal.luxury_trinket_prompt: You found a luxury trinket. You can use it as a gift when recruiting for a +2 bonus, or you can sell it.
tradeModal.luxury_trinket_recruit: Keep as a gift (+2 Recruit bonus)
tradeModal.luxury_trinket_sell: Sell it (Roll twice on Trade Table)
tradeModal.contraband_prompt: You're offered a chance to move contraband for 1D6 credits. On a roll of 4-6 for the pay, you'll also gain a Rival.
tradeModal.rare_sale_prompt: A cloaked figure offers you a rare item for 3 credits. Do you buy it?
tradeModal.odd_device_prompt: You find an odd device for sale for just 1 credit. Do you buy it?
tradeModal.unload_stuff_prompt: You find a buyer for unwanted gear. You can sell any weapon for 2 credits, provided it is not damaged.
tradeModal.unload_stuff_none: You have no undamaged weapons to sell.

tradeGoodsModal.title: Trade Goods
tradeGoodsModal.description: You have arrived on a new world with Trade Goods. Do you want to try and sell them now?

freeTradeChoiceModal.title: Free Trade Zone
freeTradeChoiceModal.description: {name} rolled twice on the Trade Table thanks to the world's trait. Choose one outcome to pursue:

recruitChoiceModal.title: Adventurous Population
recruitChoiceModal.description: Thanks to the adventurous local population, your recruitment efforts have turned up two potential candidates. Choose one to hire.

tradeResults.bits_of_scrap: {name} gathered some bits of scrap for {profit} credits.
tradeResults.local_maps: {name} acquired local star maps, making exploration easier.

tradeResults.luxury_trinket_sell: You sold the trinket for {credits} credits.
tradeResults.contraband_success: You moved the contraband and earned {credits} credits.
tradeResults.contraband_trouble: The deal was profitable, but it attracted unwanted attention! Gained a Rival.
tradeResults.trade_goods: {name} acquired some trade goods to sell later.
tradeResults.something_interesting: {name} found something interesting on the market: a {item}!
tradeResults.spare_parts: {name} found some spare parts for the ship.
tradeResults.rare_sale: {name} was offered a rare item for sale.
tradeResults.buy_success: You bought the item, it was a {item}!
tradeResults.weapon_license_fee: An additional 1 credit was paid for a weapon license.
tradeResults.weapon_license_fail: Could not afford the 1 credit weapon license fee! The weapon was confiscated.
tradeResults.stash_success: The {item} was added to the ship's stash.

tradeResults.odd_device: {name} found an odd device for sale.
tradeResults.hot_tip: {name} got a hot tip, gaining a new rumor.

tradeResults.trinket_fail: After a closer look (Roll: {roll}), the trinket was indeed worthless.

pilot.name: Pilot Training
pilot.effect: Reroll Savvy tests during Starship Travel events.

mechanic.name: Mechanic Training
mechanic.effect: Repair +1 additional ship Hull Point during each Upkeep phase.

medical.name: Medical School
medical.effect: If this character survives a battle, one casualty may roll twice on the Injury Table.

merchant.name: Merchant School
merchant.effect: When this character performs the Trade task, you may reroll the result once.

security.name: Security Training
security.effect: If this character is in a battle, add +1 to Seize the Initiative rolls.

broker.name: Broker Training
broker.effect: +1 to rolls for licenses, Advanced Training applications, and finding Patrons.

bot_technician.name: Bot Technician
bot_technician.effect: All Bot upgrades are 1 credit cheaper. Bots may reroll on the Injury Table.

shipAcquisition.title: Ship Acquisition
shipAcquisition.searchPrompt: Your crew is grounded. Search the local starport for a vessel for sale.
shipAcquisition.searchedThisTurn: You have already searched for a ship this turn.

shipGrounded.title: Ship Grounded
shipGrounded.description: The ship's drive is unstable and requires repairs. You cannot travel for {turns} more turn(s). You can perform an Emergency Take-off, but it will damage the hull.

upkeep.title: Upkeep Phase
upkeep.description: It's time to pay the crew, manage your ship, and tend to the wounded before the next turn begins.
upkeep.sellGearPrompt: Sell gear to help cover costs.
upkeep.dismissModalPrompt: They will leave with their gear. You may keep one item.
upkeep.dismissModalNoItems: This crew member has no items to keep.
upkeep.medicalBayBenefit: Medical Bay: Select one crew member with 2+ turns remaining to recover for 2 turns this upkeep phase.
upkeep.noInjured: No one is in the med bay.
upkeep.rationsApplied: Ration packs applied. Upkeep cost is 0.
upkeep.lacksFacilitiesWarning: This world lacks starship facilities. Repairs are limited to 3 credits per turn.
upkeep.repairPartsAvailable: You have {amount}cr worth of repair parts available. These will be used first.

basicSupplies.description: You have enough basic supplies to skip the upkeep cost for this turn. This will still advance recovery for injured crew.

quests.noRumors: No active rumors. Try exploring or finding patrons.

star_eater.title: The Star-Eater's Wake
star_eater.description: Whispers from across the sector speak of a colossal, world-devouring entity. The fragments of information you've gathered point to a derelict research station where the first contact was made. Investigating it could be the key to understanding, and perhaps stopping, the threat.

health_insurance.name: Health Insurance
health_insurance.effect: Write off 2 turns of injury recovery.

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.effect: Patron will remain available if you travel.

negotiable.name: Negotiable
negotiable.effect: May re-roll Danger Pay and take the better result.

hot_job.name: Hot Job
hot_job.effect: Gain a rival on a roll of 1-2 (instead of 1) after the mission.

vip.name: VIP Opponent
vip.effect: A random enemy gets +1 Toughness and Combat +2.

veteran_opposition.name: Veteran Opposition
veteran_opposition.effect: Enemies get -1 to their Panic range.

private_transport.name: Private Transport
private_transport.effect: Rivals may not track you this turn.

vengeful.name: Vengeful
vengeful.effect: If the mission is a failure, the patron becomes a Rival.

demanding.name: Demanding
demanding.effect: Danger Pay is only awarded on a success.

small_squad.name: Small Squad
small_squad.effect: You may not field more than 4 crew members.

full_squad.name: Full Squad
full_squad.effect: You must have 6 available crew members.

clean.name: Clean Record
clean.effect: You must have never had a law enforcement Rival.

busy.name: Busy
busy.effect: On success, the patron will offer a new job next turn.

one_time_contract.name: One-Time Contract
one_time_contract.effect: This patron may not be kept as a contact.

reputation_required.name: Reputation Required
reputation_required.effect: You must have completed a previous job for the patron on this world.
